info.task: navigate out of listbox popup by moving editing cursor to left
info.title: Navigate out of a listbox popup by moving the editing cursor to the left

setupScript.name: moveFocusToAlabamaInListboxAndSetInputCursorAtEnd
setupScript.description: expands the combobox,  sets the combobox value to 'Alabama', places focus on that option in the listbox popup and positions the editing cursor at the end of the textbox

user: With focus on an option in the listbox popup, navigate back to the textbox by moving the editing cursor to the left.
instructions.raw: With focus on an option in the listbox popup, navigate back to the textbox by moving the editing cursor to the left.
instructions.mode: Toggle Quick Nav OFF by pressing the Left Arrow and Right Arrow keys at the same time.

assertions.expectation: Name of the combobox ('State') is conveyed
State of the combobox (expanded) is conveyed
Text of the selected option ('Alabama') is conveyed
The ability to enter or edit text is conveyed
The presence of autocomplete behavior is conveyed
Cursor position (on the character 'a') is conveyed
